construct

public static java.lang.String construct(java.lang.String verb,
                                         java.lang.String noun,
                                         java.lang.String input)
Builds string responses as how the Drunkbot responds

Parameters:
verb - - detected verb from input of user
noun - - detected noun from input of user
input - - full string input from user
Returns:
a sentence or response dependent on presence or verbs or nouns. Responses are sometimes also randomly weight dependent in that case depending on the weight they fall into the specific modulus where a sentence is constructed with their verb or noun inputed

noVerb

public static java.lang.String noVerb(java.lang.String noun,
                                      java.lang.String input)
Parameters:
noun - - Finds noun from input if detects a noun without a verb then Drunkbot responds in Spanish
input - - full string input from user
Returns:
returns a response in Spanish - mimics/copies the user input but delivered back in Spanish

noNoun

public static java.lang.String noNoun(java.lang.String verb,
                                      java.lang.String input)
Parameters:
verb - - detects verb from input
input - - full string input from user
Returns:
returns default answers of "We are talking about liquor" default answer implementation from assignment 3 where we were instructed to implement responses to keep the conversation on track

noNounVerb

public static java.lang.String noNounVerb(java.lang.String input)
Parameters:
input - - no verb or noun is detected, takes in string input from user
